      • addValueReplace

        public static void addValueReplace(@NonNull
                                   java.lang.Object data)
        Method is used to add values to Firebase DB. All data will be wiped and replaced with the data object content
        Parameters:
        data - Data to store to Firebase

      • addValueContinuous

        public static void addValueContinuous(@NonNull
                                      java.lang.Object data)
        Method is used to add values to Firebase DB. All data will be retained and updated
        Parameters:
        data - Data to store to Firebase

      • addValueContinuousWithFilter

        public static void addValueContinuousWithFilter(@NonNull
                                                java.lang.Object data,
                                                @Nullable
                                                java.lang.Integer maxItems,
                                                @Nullable
                                                java.util.Date minDate)
        Method is usd to add values to Firebase DB. All data will be retained and updated. The data can be filtered hy max number of items and timestamp
        Parameters:
        data - Data to store to Firebase
        maxItems - Maximum number of items allowed to store to Firebase DB
        minDate - The latest date to allow history of data to store to Firebase DB

        maxItems - Maximum number of items allowed to store to Firebase DB
